name: Greenland Country Farm - Harvest Crops & Raise Happy Farm Animals
name_original: Greenland Country Farm - Harvest Crops & Raise Happy Farm Animals
description:
“Welcome to Greenland Country Farm” the most interactive Farming Game in a world of wonder, where you & your friend can grow & harvest magical crops, raise & care magical farm animals, raise creatures, produce healthy farm products, sell farm products, trade the farm fresh goods in market and decorate the most beautiful magical farm.

Greenland Country Farm includes Free updates with new farm animals as magical creatures, crops, makers, decorations, animals and much more every week.

Features
- Plant a varieties of magical crops, vegetables, & flowers
- Blend harvested magical crops in makers & produce unique magic Spells & Powers
- Buy & Sell your farm fresh goods to market and buy wonderful decorations
- Raise and care for magical farm animals & creatures with amazing personalities
- Design & decorate your farm with decorations, trees, fences & fountains. Your farm is fully customizable.
- Visit real neighbors to watch their crops grow and how your neighbour has decorated his farm
- Free updates with new fruits, crops, makers, decorations, animals and much more Every Week
- Social Gameplay: Help each other out, visit your friends’ farm to help him in growing crops
- Share your rewards & achievements with your friends on Facebook.
- Take the picture of your well decorated fantasy garden and share it with your friends on Facebook
- More land for expansions
- Beautiful animations, amazing graphics and catchy sounds gives life to your Farm
- Free to play

Greenland Country Farm is an Online Farming Game, iPhone, iPad, iPod users must be connected to Wifi in order to play the game. Moreover Greenland Country Farm is a free to play, but if you wish to enrich your experience by purchasing game items with real money. You can disable in-app purchases by adjusting your device’s settings.



Having problems or any suggestions, please write us at: support@appimize.com
